name: untilyouaresonude
text: A comment left by untilyouaresonude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, Magb, Vtoph, SenseiHollywood)

name: anomalous3
text: A comment left by anomalous3 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, erributtz, antecen, gmagnido, PoodleLucy, SenseiHollywood)

name: jollysaintpete
text: i wonder what the reasoning behind those lames was

name: anomalous3
text: perhaps people here do not approve of the illicit use of legal substances?

name: jollysaintpete
text: hah, more like, perhaps people here have never tried it

name: tasteful
text: yeah what?

name: freakywonton
text: or an extra large helping of CRACK COCAINE

name: sargasm
text: "Stuff a condom or two with light, fluffy cotton.  You've just made a unique cylinder pillow and conversation piece!"

name: senseihollywood
text: Fill a condom with equal parts raisins, sugar (fruit cocktail will suffice in a pinch) and toilet water.  Let ferment for 2-weeks.  There you have it, an easy recipe for prison cell pinot, and the added convenience of a condom/decanter that is easily removed from the toilet bowl for performing life's little unpleasant necessaries...It's a good(ish) thing

name: chaesar
text:
Fill with your favorite cocktail and tie to inside of pant leg, perfect for sneaking liquor into a sporting event.

Fill one quarter with water and tie off, place in freezer on its side. You will have the perfect ice stick to chill beverages in a yard glass.

Roll onto your dick, perfect for fucking a lady without fear of pregnancy or disease.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
one of my friends is pregnant.

she was on the pill,
he was using a condom,
and it wasn't her fertile time.

in short, this baby was going to happen 'cos God said so. or, though i think this sort of joke is lame on here, but Chuck Norris has some competition.

name: mystkmanat
text:
This was 8 months ago. Has she had it yet? How is the miracle baby doing?

[[This is a genuine question and not facetiousness]]

name: nice-on-water
text: Oh man, oh man, tell us!

name: phthoggos
text: A comment left by phthoggos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dimenur, anticitizen, nutmeg)

name: zedpower
text: He just says that because he ran out of ideas and doesn't want to admit it straight to Beef's face. Happens to me all the time.

name: phthoggos
text: A comment left by phthoggos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by littlecat, Crater12, nutmeg)

name: killingthejay
text: But it IS just like something she'd say!

name: envika
text: I like to think that Ray's last line was referring to his last idea, not Beef's last idea.

name: riazm
text:
Alt text can be used in conversation as the ultimate non-sequiter.

Cue some irritating Monty Python fan to tell me that it's not a non-sequiter.

name: littleherrdoktor
text: it's not a non-sequiter because you mean non-sequitur

name: riazm
text: The interior of the car of pain is finished in fine walnut veneer. I know this because I am inside the car of pain. I am inside it and I am being taken to school.

name: crev_gibax
text: Well conceded.

name: littleherrdoktor
text: a  for humility

name: tekende
text: I wish I could give this strip higher than a 5 just for the alt-text alone. I said it to someone one time for no reason while he was in the middle of talking and he stopped and laughed.

name: aliiis
text:
YES.
I really, really rarely actually laugh out loud when I am reading things and all on my own and stuff. I do laugh in conversation fairly often but I dunno, just maybe not as much as other people? It is a thing. But this alt text made me genuinely guffaw, I cannot explain how exceptionally funny it is. I think it coming at you out of left field like that and you're all imagining Martha Stewart's cheery smile and... anyway, yeah.

name: kickstart
text: it's the "throw it at a friend " that makes it for me. "throw it at someone" just wouldn't do.

name: tekende
text: Exactly. I can't explain why it makes such a difference, but it does.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: watching onstad's thought process carve away until he found the phrase with the highest martha quotient.

name: i_love_kate
text: Properly sterilised, a condom can serve as a passable replacement for a section of large intestine.

name: molesticide
text:
i masturbate with them.

what?

name: semiquaver
text: Yeah.  ;-;

name: foetus_punch
text: You may have heard rumours that sex is actually better for uncircumcised guys while using a condom. These rumours (for me at least) are true.

name: semiquaver
text: One only wishes they could solve the pinching problem.

name: trialandterror
text: what.

name: trialandterror
text:
Seriously, this is the most wrong you can be.

2 reasons to have sex - to feel good, and to make babies. Condoms prevent both. The work of the devil.

name: foetus_punch
text:
Yeah man! Totally! I mean, sex is exactly the same for for everyone, right?

Nah, I'm not buyin' it.

name: soticoto
text:
Or it could be painted yellow to make an X-Men costume for enthusiastic young boys.


Wait... are we talking about normal-sized condoms now or the huge one?

name: iskander
text: Place a condom inside a light bulb for inexpensive mood lighting for parties, or other social events.

name: bjorntd
text:
... How would you get it in there?

OH. You meant the other way around.

name: bilingualmonkey
text: I love how in panel five they're basically fighting for the best Stewart impression, which Beef subsequently nails. Brilliantly observed.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Oh, Hee, Hee, Hee, Hee, Hee...

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ideal

name: dorothyzbornak
text: they start to get competitive in panel four.  i am for this strip.
